subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Devin Harris scored a career-high 47 points Sunday night and the Nets, who had lost 14 consecutive games in Phoenix, rallied to beat the Suns, 117-109.
snippet: Devin Harris scored a career-high 47 points Sunday night and the Nets, who had lost 14 consecutive games in Phoenix, rallied to beat the Suns, 117-109.
